channel.title: [PI] Changing Client Sprites .DAT
channel.description:
I downloaded a new released client and i wanted to change sprites and stuff but it works with a .dat file i dont know how to edit these sprites could someone help me out?
Thnx
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/help/552951-pi-changing-client-sprites-dat-rep-2.html Check this to it same problem but some people tryed give an answer but its not solved yet.
